storyInfo: A case of impeachment from the past, a retired Deputy Minister, and an act of justice outside Yanese law. Within two hours, the deliberations between Deputy Minister Lin Qingyan from the Central Judicial Office and Monitor Censors Taihe and Jie Zhen from the Department of Discipline and Supervision must yield an adjudication.

attributes.content: Phew...
Thank you for coming.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: It just happens I'm on duty today...
Taihe, what is there that we cannot discuss in the Department of Discipline and Supervision's offices?
So it is about Deputy Minister Yu after all.
Are you truly so eager to deal with your predecessor, Deputy Minister Lin Qingyan?
This, too, is the Department of Discipline and Supervision Censorate's responsibility. Perhaps you are being too negligent with this matter, Monitor Censor Jie Zhen.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: This is precisely why I summoned you two here.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The Department of Discipline and Supervision monitors a variety of officials among its ranks. Though the man in question has since resigned and returned to his home, he must be held liable for the transgressions he committed during his tenure.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: This has much to do with Deputy Minister Yu Cheng's fabrication of evidence during the impeachment of Langyi's magistrate all those years ago, and though you two have already discussed this matter for many times, we have yet to reach a conclusion.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: In roughly two hours, Deputy Minister Yu Cheng will arrive in this place...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You summoned him here behind my back?!
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Such is Taihe.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: We can ill afford to wait any longer. Regardless of how this is resolved, the two of you must arrive at a conclusion in these two scant hours.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: If he will be brought to justice, then we three shall hear this case here in the courts' stead to uphold the law of Great Yan.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: If we instead turn a blind eye, then I ask you to keep your distance when Deputy Minister Yu arrives and let us catch up on old times.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: These hills are less than twenty li from the capital. The moment he enters the city, there will be no more room to turn the situation around.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: As I've always said, you truly are unreasonable.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: I've said this many times as well. Deputy Minister Lin Qingyan merely does what the Deputy Minister of the Central Judicial Office Assistant must.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Ten years ago, when Deputy Minister Yu inspected the nation's many prisons, he passed by Langyi and indicted the local magistrate. After a year and three months, the magistrate died in prison.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: And I discovered certain discrepancies while going over the literature.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Three months ago, I visited Langyi and looked into the matter... The key evidence that Deputy Minister Yu used during the impeachment, such as the account book and directory of personnel were all indeed fabricated.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The evidence I have gathered is conclusive, irrefutable.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I don't mean to refute this old case, no.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: I just mean to ask... Do you think the magistrate did not deserve his impeachment?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Is it not the truth that during his years in the position, he deceived the entire institution from top to bottom, appropriating great sums of the royal court's wealth?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Is it not also indisputable, nay, irrefutable that he repeatedly misused his position and issued local decrees to levy new taxes?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: How long did he block the appeals of subjects demanding redress for their injustices, bribe government inspectors and officials, falsify the sentiment of the populace in his reports to the capital, causing immeasurable harm?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Of the dozens of charges he was impeached upon, was there a single one that was fabricated?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: They were all true.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: If Deputy Minister Yu had implicated a good man, we would not be discussing the matter.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The impeachment of the Langyi magistrate also implicated some dozen mandarins in the Langyi and capital governments, as well as the inspectorate. The ensuing investigations showed all were guilty as charged. The news shook the court, struck the provinces with astonishment, and improved social ethos for the better.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: From what I have heard, letters of appreciation from the masses arrived to the Central Judicial Office and the Department of Discipline and Supervision in tall piles.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: From a bystander's point of view, was the impeachment somehow not satisfactory to the citizenry?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Put another way, Deputy Minister Yu's actions were to the benefit of the masses, were they not?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Taihe, what do you think?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: I agree.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Furthermore, it would seem that you have misunderstood me.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: I never said I would not handle this matter.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: By handle, you mean...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The Central Judicial Office will remove Yu Cheng's name from its ledgers. The Ministry of Revenue will confiscate his retirement, and the benefits he enjoyed after returning to his hometown will be cancelled.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Furthermore, should Yu Cheng's relatives apply for official posts in the future, the court will take this into consideration.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: At the same time, all officials of the Ministry of Justice, the Department of Discipline and Supervision, and the Central Judicial Office must, regardless of their rank, take his case as a warning.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: And if Yu Cheng is truly a treacherous villain, before we send him to prison, I will first torture him with my string.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: But he dedicated his entire life to his duties. He is a good official, and he is almost seventy years of age. Can we not grant him a smooth, peaceful retirement, at the very least?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: You wish to keep this under wraps and minimize his punishment for such a major transgression... His crimes would go unpunished and hidden from all under Heaven. How is this 'the very least?'
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Taihe, what say you?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You agree...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Taihe, I know what kind of man you are. You always distinguish right from wrong, and you handle all official business impartially. Never have I seen you hem and haw so much. It's why you were able to become Monitor Censor so soon after you retired from the military.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: But why so hesitant this time?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You flatter me.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: To tell the truth...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Ranks and perspectives aside for the moment, I have nothing but admiration for what Deputy Minister Yu did at the time.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The magistrate was infamous for his conduct. Though Langyi saw many challenge his rule over the years, none prevailed before him.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The magistrate kept his deeds clandestine and concealed. He was a deviously cunning man, and he had just about everyone in his pocket. If he had any other choice, Deputy Minister Yu would not have resorted to such methods.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: To solve that case, he put his own personal wealth and life on the line.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Someone so honorable and upright... with such immense bravery, willing to brave even death... He is no less a man than my comrades on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: This is why I have no choice but to ask the two of you to make this decision.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Taihe, to be frank, I admire your gentle sentiments.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: I, too, admire Deputy Minister Yu's character.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Do you see that tree ahead of us?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The three turn at the hillside corner, abruptly opening up their view.

Taihe and Jie Zhen follow Lin Qingyan's gaze. A bottomless cliff and a cloud haze block the way forward, but a lone, thin pine tree stands tall, tainting its surroundings with a jade color that cannot be hidden by the snow.
A year ago, when I first came to the Central Judicial Office from the Tianshi Bureau, Deputy Minister Yu was my most respected predecessor.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: He wished to return home, and I insisted on seeing him off. He took a detour and brought me onto this mountain.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: No wonder you arrived much sooner than Taihe and me.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: He planted that pine tree himself many years ago.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: At the time, Deputy Minister Yu was still young and inexperienced. He climbed high and looked far ahead to see nothing but clouds and mist. Suddenly, the sunlight broke through, dispersing the gloom, shining clear on heaven and earth...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: He thought of how he was to enter the capital, to take up his post at the Central Judicial Office. He was filled with a mix of emotions.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: He vowed to uphold justice for the people, to become the last line of defense for the laws of Yan, to ensure that none would be wronged. Thus, he planted a pine sapling to symbolize his determination.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Our good Deputy Minister Yu!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Good indeed. The sapling has now grown into a tall, upright tree. Likewise, my predecessor has lived up to his aspirations from when it was planted.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Yu Cheng is the most outstanding Deputy Minister the Central Judicial Office has had. He made countless fair judgments, and the case of Langyi's magistrate is not the most difficult he has adjudicated.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: He erred only this once. But he did err this once.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: To see a pine tree mature in such a way is a rare sight.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Anyone who climbs so far to be faced with such a tree, standing tall, reaching for the clouds, enduring storm and wind unbreaking, would find his heart invigorated.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Deputy Minister Lin Qingyan, were this tree toppled, to what degree would the enthusiasm of those climbers be dampened?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: It seems Monitor Censor Jie Zhen has a point to make.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I wish to suppress this case, not only to protect Yu Cheng.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Deputy Minister Qingyan, having just taken a post at the Central Judicial Office barely one year ago, has thoroughly examined all documents pertaining to the former Deputy Minister. Following his retirement, the former Deputy Minister was recalled and convicted.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Does this not suggest that the next Deputy Minister of the Central Judicial Office should investigate you upon his appointment?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Deputy Minister Qingyan happened to come across the relevant records during routine archival work...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Indeed. But what difference does that make?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: You and I both know that even the purest, most innocent soul cannot withstand investigation. Particularly in matters concerning civil service.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Think about it. If we establish this precedent, officials of all rank will stand on edge, acting only out of concern over future investigation. It will hinder the execution of their duties.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: The slightest indication that one may have lost his way becomes a vulnerability. Whether colleagues or successors, one never knows when ill intention may uncover something, with imprisonment the end result.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: If we continue down this path, would anyone dare make progress during their tenure?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Deputy Minister Qingyan, the Three Organs of Justice are not the Tianshi Bureau. We have more to weigh than righteousness alone.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Jie Zhen, why do you change the subject?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: As the Deputy Minister of the Central Judicial Office, you have chosen to describe the act of forging evidence as merely 'losing one's way'?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I'm afraid I cannot agree with your position.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: You would take no action and call it an act of preservation?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: In my early years studying Lei Fa, the Tianshi instructed me: 'One who controls lighting must first respect its power, lest one come to harm oneself.'
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Among the Three Organs of Justice, the Department of Discipline and Supervision oversees the civil service, while the Central Judicial Office reviews criminal cases. Behind every official and every case, there must be a pair of watchful eyes and a final checkpoint.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: And so do we require a Censorate to censure the Censors? Another pair of eyes behind us? There is no perfect system under Heaven, and it is not possible to keep infinitely layering inspectors.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: And so the ones we must be inspecting first and foremost are ourselves. Otherwise, how are we to ensure that the law truly protects all the subjects of Great Yan?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: We all serve the Three Organs of Justice. You may not be unaware of this principle!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Does the law not allow for compassion?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: Is it you who is truly ruthless, or is it the law of Yan?
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: If those who enforce the law are not bound by the law, then what is the use of establishing the law?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Calm yourselves, please...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I must see this case through. And not only to dispose of Yu Cheng.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Back in Langyi, Deputy Minister Yu lost his way and resorted to half measures when faced with a corrupt but cunning magistrate. In pursuit of justice, this seems somewhat understandable.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Were it you or I, we may have made the same choice.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: But what if the future brought us a more ambiguous case? What if, in the future, we found ourselves with ill intent?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Would it be easier to lose our way and resort to such measures in order to seize a good man in place of a bad one?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Indeed, it would make the execution of ill intent that much simpler.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The law of the land decides life and death. In the fulfillment of our duties, we may tolerate neither error nor deviation.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Deputy Minister Qingyan speaks with enlightening wisdom.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: There is no margin of error before the law. The Grand Tutor taught me as much.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: If my admiration for Deputy Minister Yu has brought shame to the laws of Yan... such would be a breach of my duty.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Now then, Deputy Minister Yu should be arriving momentarily.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Monitor Censor Jie Zhen, have you anything else to say?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The conversation having arrived where it has... Deputy Minister Qingyan raised the case, and so the right of adjudication naturally lies with her.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: I admit you speak with reason and logic.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: But I still ask the both of you to consider the impact that impeaching Yu Cheng may have, particularly in comparison to the impeachment of the Langyi magistrate.
attributes.name: Jie Zhen

attributes.content: And so, Deputy Minister, adjudicate.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: What we call law is like lightning, looming over the heads and hearts of man.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: All that is, is the Thunderlight.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: If the thunder does not strike, then Lin Qingyan cannot function as Deputy Minister of the Central Judicial Office.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Under the shining sun, a sudden thunderclap startles the fowlbeasts into swift flight, and accumulated snow on the branches collapses in a flurry. Yet the pine tree remains tall and gains a few more shades of green.
At the foot of the mountain, the awaited guest steps out of his vehicle. He peers upward, unmoving for a long while.
